message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, given the inflation will impact us both differently.  We can work this out further if you'd prefer.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I think a 55/45 split is more fair considering the inflation will affect us differently. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Let's be reasonable.  With the inflation impacting us both, a 50/50 split is the fairest way to move forward.  It's time to compromise.
